about_the_game:
Summon: Joint Escape is a cooperative horror survival game for 1-4 players. Find a way to escape from a stalker in camouflage uniform who wants to give you a piece of paper with the inscription "Summon".

The main genres of the game are horror, memes, action, co-op.

What Is Special About This Game?

  • A post-Soviet style game space.
  • Smart artificial intelligence.
  • The rage and speed of the opponents increases as the game progresses.
  • Random object generation makes each game unique.
  • You can fight with the local gangsters.
  • Cooperative and single player mode.

The game is a fiction and has nothing to do with reality, any coincidences with real events or personalities are completely random. The game features a fictional world. The game does not call anyone to anything, does not promote anything, and also does not aim to offend or humiliate anyone.
